title: formbio/laava
description: Perform standard analysis of AAV long-read sequencing data.

seq_reads_file.title: Sequencing reads file
seq_reads_file.help_text: PacBio AAV sequencing HiFi/CCS reads as a file in unaligned BAM or FASTQ format. The PacBio instrument should have been run in AAV mode.

seq_reads_folder.title: Sequencing reads folder
seq_reads_folder.description: PacBio long-read sequencing data (folder of FASTQs)
seq_reads_folder.help_text: Folder of PacBio AAV sequencing HiFi/CCS reads in unaligned FASTQ format. The PacBio instrument should have been run in AAV mode.

vector_type.title: Vector type
vector_type.help_text: Whether the vector construct is designed to be single-stranded AAV (ssAAV), self-complementary AAV (scAAV), or unknown/unspecified.

vector_bed.title: Vector annotation
vector_bed.help_text: Annotated vector region coordinates in 4-column BED format. Must include 1 region with the label 'vector'.

vector_fa.title: Vector sequence
vector_fa.help_text: Reference sequence for the vector plasmid. The annotations apply to this sequence.

packaging_fa.title: Packaging sequences
packaging_fa.description: Helper and RepCap plasmids (if used) and other reference sequences (FASTA)
packaging_fa.help_text: Reference sequences for the helper and rep/cap plasmids and other sequences of interest, such as Lambda, as a FASTA file with one or more records. This should not include the vector construct or host genome sequences.

host_fa.title: Host sequences
host_fa.help_text: Reference sequence for the host genome.

host_exons.title: Host Regions File
host_exons.help_text: Workflow will calculate the number of reads that overlap regions in the is file.  If they are exons, the workflow will combine regions from the same gene if the name of the region follows the pattern: GeneSymbol|GeneName|TranscriptID|ExonNumber|Strand

repcap_name.title: RepCap sequence ID
repcap_name.description: RepCap sequence identifier used in the packaging FASTA file
repcap_name.help_text: Sequence identifier used in the packaging FASTA file (above) corresponding to the rep/cap plasmid reference sequence, if used. Leave this blank if a dual construct was used (rep/cap on the vector backbone) or you're unsure.

flipflop_name.title: AAV Serotype
flipflop_name.description: AAV serotype name for flip/flop analysis
flipflop_name.help_text: Serotype name for ITR flip/flop analysis, e.g. 'AAV2'. Leave blank to skip flip/flop analysis.

flipflop_fa.title: Flip/flop sequences
flipflop_fa.help_text: Provide for flip/flop analysis if serotype is not AAV2 (which is built in), and provide a different value for flipflop_name. FASTA file must have 4 records with the exact sequence IDs SEQ_LEFT_FLIP, SEQ_LEFT_FLOP, SEQ_RIGHT_FLIP, SEQ_RIGHT_FLOP.

target_gap_threshold.title: Target gap threshold
target_gap_threshold.help_text: Maximum total gap size allowed in the target region alignment to count a read as 'full'; skipping through the on-target region for more than this is considered 'full-gap'.

max_allowed_outside_vector.title: Max allowed outside vector
max_allowed_outside_vector.help: Maximum allowed, in bp, outside the annotated vector region for a read that fully covers the vector region to be still considered 'full' rather than 'vector+backbone'.

max_allowed_missing_flanking.title: Max allowed missing from ITR flank
max_allowed_missing_flanking.help: Maximum allowed, in bp, missing from the left and right flanks of the annotated vector region to be still considered 'full' rather than 'partial'.

inputs.title: Advanced Configuration
inputs.help_text: Advanced configuration values for read classification
